step1.title: What's your main goal?
step1.description: Tell us what brings you here today so we can personalize your experience.

step2.title: What are you interested in?
step2.description: Choose topics you want to learn more about. This helps us recommend the right coaches and programs.

step3.title: How do you prefer to interact?
step3.description: Your preference helps us find coaches with the right style for you.

step4.title: What's your experience level?
step4.description: This ensures we show you content that's neither too basic nor too advanced.

step5.title: Final touches
step5.description: These optional settings help us refine your results even further.

submit.success: Your details have been saved successfully!
submit.error: Error submitting your data. Please try again.

welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.subtitle: Hey {{name}}, let's set up your account to find the best coaches for you.

one_on_one.title: Find 1-on-1 coaching
one_on_one.description: Connect directly with coaches for personal sessions.

programs.title: Explore digital programs
programs.description: Find self-study courses and programs that fit your schedule.

live_sessions.title: Join live sessions
live_sessions.description: Get immediate help and interact in real-time via video.

webinars.title: Attend webinars
webinars.description: Learn from experts in live presentations and group events.

exploring.title: I'm just browsing
exploring.description: I'm not sure yet and want to explore the possibilities.

interests.title: What are you interested in?
interests.description: Choose topics you want to learn more about. This helps us recommend the right coaches and programs.

style.title: How do you prefer to interact?

live.title: Live & Interactive
live.description: I prefer real-time video sessions and direct communication.

scheduled.title: Scheduled & Structured
scheduled.description: I like regular check-ins and asynchronous communication like messaging.

self_paced.title: Self-Paced & Flexible
self_paced.description: I learn best by working through materials on my own.

beginner.title: Beginner
beginner.description: I'm just starting out and looking for foundational guidance.

intermediate.title: Intermediate
intermediate.description: I have some experience and want to deepen my skills.

advanced.title: Expert
advanced.description: I'm highly experienced and looking for specialized expertise.

budget.label: Hourly Budget
budget.description: What is your approximate budget for a 1-on-1 coaching hour?

notifications.label: Notifications
notifications.description: Get notified to stay up to date.
notifications.newCoaches: New coaches in my areas of interest
notifications.newPrograms: New programs that match my goals

step1c.title: The Basics
step1c.description: Upload a profile picture and create a catchy headline that sums up your expertise.
step1c.headlinePlaceholder: e.g., Career Coach for Tech Leaders

step2c.title: Your Expertise
step2c.description: Showcase your specialties, skills, and the languages you offer coaching in.

step3c.title: Your Credentials
step3c.description: Share your background, education, and coaching styles to build trust with potential clients.

step4c.title: Services & Pricing
step4c.description: Define your pricing for scheduled sessions and spontaneous live sessions.
step4c.baseRateDescription: This is your standard price for a 60-minute 1-on-1 session. You can add more session types, special rates, and discounts later.
step4c.liveSessionDescription: Allow clients to start a video session with you whenever you're online. Billing is per minute.

step5c.title: Business Setup
step5c.description: Configure your tax information and any insurance recognitions.
step5c.taxDescription: Please provide your business tax information. This is required for invoicing and payouts.
step5c.insuranceDescription: If your services are recognized by health insurance providers, add your qualifications here.

step6c.title: Publish Profile
step6c.description: Preview your profile, then go live to be discovered by your first clients.
step6c.previewTitle: How clients will see your profile
step6c.finalStepDescription: Ready to publish your profile? You can always come back and make changes.
